steps.description: Preparation of the mixtures takes place using mechanochemistry as a method of carbonaceous matter and catalyst application.
heating of the system, resulting starch gelation and better homogenization of the sample
All the silica/starch/Ni(NO3)2 mixtures obtained mechanochemically were subjected to the pyrolysis process.

synthesis.notes: The molar ratio of SiO2/starch/Ni2+ was 1:0.3:0.1–0.5.

scores.equipment_extraction_reasoning: The main equipment items (Planetary Mill, rotary quartz reactor) are identified with their vendors. Settings are not fully specified in the text, so their absence is not a major issue.

scores.format_compliance_reasoning: The extracted data adheres to the GeneralSynthesisOntology schema and data type requirements.
scores.overall_reasoning: The extraction is generally good, capturing the main aspects of the synthesis. However, inaccuracies in material amounts and missing conditions need to be addressed to improve the overall quality.
